SELECT pcpic.*, pci.mer_name FROM t_payment_channel_pay_info_cfg pcpic LEFT JOIN t_payment_channel_info pci ON pcpic.department_id = pci.department_id WHERE 1=1
and pcpic.department_id in
#{item}
and pcpic.type like concat(#{queryForm.type}, '%')
and pcpic.username like concat(#{queryForm.username}, '%')
and pcpic.bank_no like concat(#{queryForm.bankNo}, '%')
and pcpic.status = #{queryForm.status}
ORDER BY pcpic.create_time DESC
